question: You have lost something on a bus and called customer service to get help. You weren't happy with their response. Write a letter to the bus company manager.In your letter, you should:describe the item you lostexplain why you weren't happy with the customer servicesay what action you would like the company to take.
text: With due respect, I am writing to express my dissatisfaction with the customer support of lost and found inquiries. Therefore, I am seeking your support in this situation.

I travelled from Delhi to Gurugram in bus number DL05 2134 on 15th May 2021. When I got off the bus, I found that my phone was missing which might have been left on seat number A21. I immediately called the customer care service. The executive was not only rude but also reluctant to provide any support in this matter.

I am well aware that the chances of retrieving my mobile are low; however, at least we should give it a try as I tried calling on my contact number(8822456754) and it is not switched off yet. Can you please contact the bus driver who can thoroughly search the bus and inform me if he finds the mobile phone?

Let me share the specifics of the phone. It is a OnePlus 5 limited edition phone with a blue back cover having a picture of two pandas on it. The front screen guard is having a crack at the bottom left corner. The lock screen wallpaper has a photo of my daughter playing with our pet dog.
I will be extremely thankful for your favour and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
